verbs.description: scrouge (third-person singular simple present scrouges, present participle scrouging, simple past and past participle scrouged)

entries.meaning: (UK, dialect and US, colloquial, transitive) To crowd; to squeeze.
examples: Well, pretty soon the whole town was there, squirming and scrouging and pushing and shoving to get at the window and have a look [â€¦]
